text: David Brooks (born August 11, 1961) is a Canadian-American conservative political cultural commentator. He worked for The New York Times.Eberstadt, Mary (ed.), "Why I turned right: leading baby boom conservatives chronicle their political journeys", Simon and Schuster (2007). He was a movie critic for The Washington Times and a reporter for The Wall Street Journal,Columnist Biography: David Brooks, The New York Times He also worked for Newsweek, The Atlantic Monthly and PBS NewsHour. Brooks was an executive director of the Aspen Institute from 2018 until he was forced to quit in 2021 because of a conflict of interest. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Canadian journalists Category:American political commentators Category:Writers from Toronto
title: David Brooks (commentator)
